title: What is the Vienna tennis schedule?

Vienna

Learn who is in action at the ATP 500 event

October 23, 2024

Thomas Kronsteiner/Getty Images

The Erste Bank Open will be held from 21-27 October. By ATP Staff

The action at the Erste Bank Open continues Thursday in Vienna, where Alex de Minaur, Grigor Dimitrov and Jack Draper are among the stars who will be in action.

View the full Thursday order of play below to see who is competing, on which court, and when they are scheduled.

ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, 24 OCTOBER 2024

Center Court - start 13:30
Luciano Darderi (ITA) vs [7] Jack Draper (GBR)
[3] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) vs Tomas Machac (CZE)

Not Before 6 p.m.
Flavio Cobolli (ITA) vs [2] Alex de Minaur (AUS)
Karen Khachanov vs Brandon Nakashima (USA)

#Glaubandich - start 12 p.m.
[Q] Jakub Mensik (CZE) vs Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB)
Neal Skupski (GBR) / Michael Venus (NZL) vs [2] Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Matthew Ebden (AUS)
Maximo Gonzalez (ARG) / Andres Molteni (ARG) vs [4] Nathaniel Lammons (USA) / Jackson Withrow (USA)

Not Before 4 p.m.
[3] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR) vs [Q] Lukas Klein (SVK) / Jozef Kovalik (SVK)

Read More News View All News
